about_the_game:
Have you ever wanted to build your own city on an island? Embark on an exciting journey with Meer's: Escape! While exploring a huge island full of secrets and mysteries, you have to settle on the island as much as possible and the most interesting thing starts with trying to escape from the island...

Things are not going well on this island. There is no help coming to this island in any way. You, the president of this island, and your citizens are alone on this island.

Build all the buildings to get rid of the island. Or just focus on building the Escape. Employ your citizens and get resources. Build the Escape with the resources you obtain.

There is something you need to watch out for! The island's resources are running out. But don't worry. You can replace depleted resources with new ones.

Now, sit back and focus on this relaxing yet compelling story of escape from the island. Whether you want to escape from the island or build an island city. But no matter what, feed your citizens!!!
